name: places/ChIJHX63dO9YwokRAydo4A0UX7Y

displayName.text: Stephen Gelfman, DDS,MD & Cary Miles, DDS MOSAIC

formattedAddress: 115 E 61st St 3rd floor, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 115 E 61st St 3rd floor, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: I got my right wisdom teeth extracted, top and bottom, in literally about 15 minutes with Dr. Cary Miles. He informed me of everything to expect as it was happening, and then it was just *done.* I cannot express enough how easy the entire process was. I don't even think they got saliva on the bib. He's extremely talented, his team is easy to talk to and they're all very knowledgeable. It was not at all like "pulling teeth". A cold shower would have been more uncomfortable. I'm still in awe. Still getting through post op but within a few hours, I'm doing fine on advil. Again, Dr. Miles has a very special skill. Definitely went to the right place.

originalText.text: Great experience with Dr Miles. Was referred here by my dentist. Was very straightforward, great staff, friendly, and wisdom teeth removal was pretty much as painless as you could make it.

text.text: Great experience with Dr Miles. Was referred here by my dentist. Was very straightforward, great staff, friendly, and wisdom teeth removal was pretty much as painless as you could make it.

originalText.text:
Dr. Stephen Gelfman removed my problem tooth. He was very professional as was his staff. The process was very easy and I was well prepared-and zero pain.

His receptionist Julie is a doll. She is always incredibly helpful even when she is deliving information about insurance (which is always so stressful). She goes above abd beyond without even asking.

I am a highly anxious patient with too many questions and as annoying as I probably am, they never make me feel silly or ridiculous.

They have a well oiled business with great bedside manner and no unwanted bill surprises.

I will absolutely be returning here to have my implant installed, especially since I know they will do the work perfectly to my unrealist standards :P.

Highly suggest this office if you need hand holding.

originalText.text: Waiting to be seen after having 2 tooth extractions sent from my dentist office for a calcified root. My mouth is full of gauze, already numb and uncomfortable i asked the secretary and no answer as to how long before i will be seen. Yet, the secretary came to inform me i  will have to pay >$270 today and she is pissed that im asking for the second time how long of a wait i will have. Btw im the only person in the waiting room right now.

originalText.text: Very friendly staff, Dr Miles is very witty and positive while he Talks to you, pleasant demeanor and a great sense of humor.  One of the best doctors I’ve ever been too
